extendedInfo.description: The app will help you put your infant children to sleep quickly and calmly. After the installation on your smartphone you will be able to play several monotonous sounds that help baby fall asleep quickly. These are the sounds of water, wind, beating heart, car engine, hair dryer, TV and some others.ImportantBefore you add your comment/rate the app please read the advice below (click more and scroll down).FunctionsThe app allows you to adjust the volume level of played sounds and also to play several different sounds simultaneously. You can also record any sound or voice and play it simultaneously with the default application sounds. Each sound can be played for a particular time set by the user. The app also has a very useful feature â muting the phone ringer when the application is switched on (so that the ringer wonât wake your child up). New sounds ideasWe are planning to develop our application by increasing its functionality and adding new sounds, lullabies. If you have new ideas of sound or lullaby that help your children fall asleep please send them to us via email or write about it in the comments. We will develop the app accordingly so that it serves you well. Report a bugIn case the app doesnât work correctly, before you give us low rating, please fill in a short survey at http://apps.examobile.com/sleepsheep/ and report the bug.We would like to wish you a pleasant time using the app and also invite you to visit our website www.examobile.com and our Facebook Fun Page http://www.facebook.com/SleepSheepSoundLullabiesTAGS: babies, children, preschool, sound effects, sounds, lullabies, preschool, baby music, happy baby, cartoons, quiet, sleep, nap, sleep, relax,white noise.

reviews.comment: Great app, works perfectly, lots of sounds and can even record your own sounds to loop. Our little one loves the sound of the tumble dryer and now it doesn\'t have to be running all the time.
